title: FormControl
contents:
API > @angular/forms
mode_edit code

FormControllink

跟踪单个表单控件的值和验证状态。

Tracks the value and validation status of an individual form control.

查看"说明"...

参见link

  • AbstractControl

  • 使用说明

说明link

这是 Angular 表单的四个基本构建块之一，与 FormGroup、FormArray 和 FormRecord 。它扩展了 AbstractControl 类，该类实现了用于访问值、验证状态、用户交互和事件的大多数基础特性。

This is one of the four fundamental building blocks of Angular forms, along with FormGroup, FormArray and FormRecord. It extends the AbstractControl class that implements most of the base functionality for accessing the value, validation status, user interactions and events.

FormControl 接受一个通用参数，该参数描述其值的类型。此参数始终隐式包含 null ，因为控件可以重置。要更改此行为，请设置 nonNullable 或查看下面的使用说明。

FormControl takes a single generic argument, which describes the type of its value. This argument always implicitly includes null because the control can be reset. To change this behavior, set nonNullable or see the usage notes below.

请参阅下面的用法示例。

See usage examples below.

Further information is available in the Usage Notes...

mode_edit code

Construct a FormControl with no initial value or validators.

属性link

属性 说明
defaultValue: TValue 只读

此 FormControl 的默认值，每当控件在没有显式值的情况下重置时使用。有关配置默认值的更多信息，请参阅 FormControlOptions 。

The default value of this FormControl, used whenever the control is reset without an explicit value. See FormControlOptions for more information on configuring a default value.

方法link

setValue()link

mode_edit code

为表单控件设置新值。

Sets a new value for the form control.
setValue(value: TValue, options?: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; emitModelToViewChange?: boolean; emitViewToModelChange?: boolean; }): void
参数
value TValue

控件的新值。

The new value for the control.
options object

确定控件如何传播更改并在值更改时发出事件的配置选项。配置选项会传递给 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

Configuration options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events when the value changes. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

  • onlySelf ：当为 true 时，每次更改只影响此控件，而不影响其父控件。默认为 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent ：当为 true 或不提供（默认）时，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可观察对象会在更新控件值时发出具有最新状态和值的事件。当 false 时，不会发出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control value is updated. When false, no events are emitted.

  • emitModelToViewChange ：当为 true 或未提供（默认）时，每次更改都会触发 onChange 事件以更新视图。

    emitModelToViewChange: When true or not supplied (the default), each change triggers an onChange event to update the view.

  • emitViewToModelChange ：当为 true 或未提供（默认）时，每次更改都会触发 ngModelChange 事件以更新模型。

    emitViewToModelChange: When true or not supplied (the default), each change triggers an ngModelChange event to update the model.

可选值。默认值为 undefined。
返回值

void

patchValue()link

mode_edit code

修补控件的值。

Patches the value of a control.

See also:

  • 选项的 setValue

    setValue for options
patchValue(value: TValue, options?: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; emitModelToViewChange?: boolean; emitViewToModelChange?: boolean; }): void
参数
value TValue
options object

可选值。默认值为 undefined。
返回值

void

在此级别，此函数在功能上与 setValue 相同。它的存在是为了与 FormGroups 和 FormArrays 上的 patchValue 对称，在这里它的行为方式不同。

This function is functionally the same as setValue at this level. It exists for symmetry with patchValue on FormGroups and FormArrays, where it does behave differently.

reset()link

mode_edit code

重置表单控件，将其标记为 pristine 和 untouched ，并重置值。新值将是提供的值（如果通过） null ，如果 nonNullable 是通过 FormControlOptions 在构造函数中设置的，则为初始值。

Resets the form control, marking it pristine and untouched, and resetting the value. The new value will be the provided value (if passed), null, or the initial value if nonNullable was set in the constructor via FormControlOptions.
reset(formState?: TValue | FormControlState<TValue>, options?: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
参数
formState TValue | FormControlState<TValue>

使用初始值或定义初始值和禁用状态的对象重置控件。

可选值。默认值为 undefined。

Resets the control with an initial value, or an object that defines the initial value and disabled state.
options object

确定控件如何传播更改并在值更改后发出事件的配置选项。

Configuration options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events after the value changes.

  • onlySelf ：当为 true 时，每次更改只影响此控件，而不影响其父控件。默认为 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent ：当 true 或未提供（默认）时，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可观察对象会在控件重置时发出具有最新状态和值的事件。当 false 时，不会发出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is reset. When false, no events are emitted.

可选值。默认值为 undefined。
返回值

void
// By default, the control will reset to null. const dog = new FormControl('spot'); dog.reset(); // dog.value is null // If this flag is set, the control will instead reset to the initial value. const cat = new FormControl('tabby', {nonNullable: true}); cat.reset(); // cat.value is "tabby" // A value passed to reset always takes precedence. const fish = new FormControl('finn', {nonNullable: true}); fish.reset('bubble'); // fish.value is "bubble"

getRawValue()link

mode_edit code

对于简单的 FormControl ，原始值等于 值。

For a simple FormControl, the raw value is equivalent to the value.
getRawValue(): TValue
参数

没有参数。

返回值

TValue

registerOnChange()link

mode_edit code

为更改事件注册一个侦听器。

Register a listener for change events.
registerOnChange(fn: Function): void
参数
fn Function

值更改时调用的方法

The method that is called when the value changes
返回值

void

registerOnDisabledChange()link

mode_edit code

为禁用的事件注册一个侦听器。

Register a listener for disabled events.
registerOnDisabledChange(fn: (isDisabled: boolean) => void): void
参数
fn (isDisabled: boolean) => void

禁用状态更改时调用的方法。

The method that is called when the disabled status changes.
返回值

void

使用说明link

初始化表单控件link

Initializing Form Controlslink

实例化一个 FormControl ，具有一个初始值。

Instantiate a FormControl, with an initial value.

const control = new FormControl('some value'); console.log(control.value); // 'some value'

以下示例使用表单状态对象初始化控件。在这种情况下，需要 value 和 disabled 键。

The following example initializes the control with a form state object. The value and disabled keys are required in this case.

const control = new FormControl({ value: 'n/a', disabled: true }); console.log(control.value); // 'n/a' console.log(control.status); // 'DISABLED'

以下示例使用同步验证器初始化控件。

The following example initializes the control with a synchronous validator.

const control = new FormControl('', Validators.required); console.log(control.value); // '' console.log(control.status); // 'INVALID'

以下示例使用 options 对象初始化控件。

The following example initializes the control using an options object.

const control = new FormControl('', { validators: Validators.required, asyncValidators: myAsyncValidator });

单一类型参数link

The single type argumentlink

FormControl 接受一个通用参数，该参数描述了其值的类型。在大多数情况下，将推断此参数。

FormControl accepts a generic argument, which describes the type of its value. In most cases, this argument will be inferred.

如果你将控件初始化为 null ，或者你希望提供更广泛的类型，你可以显式指定参数：

If you are initializing the control to null, or you otherwise wish to provide a wider type, you may specify the argument explicitly:

let fc = new FormControl<string|null>(null); fc.setValue('foo');

你可能会注意到 null 始终添加到控件的类型。这是因为如果你调用 reset ，控件将变为 null 。你可以通过设置 {nonNullable: true} 来更改此行为。

You might notice that null is always added to the type of the control. This is because the control will become null if you call reset. You can change this behavior by setting {nonNullable: true}.

把控件配置为在 blur 事件上进行更新link

Configure the control to update on a blur eventlink

将 updateOn 选项设置为 'blur' 以在 blur event 上进行更新。

Set the updateOn option to 'blur' to update on the blur event.

const control = new FormControl('', { updateOn: 'blur' });

配置控件以在提交事件上进行更新link

Configure the control to update on a submit eventlink

将 updateOn 选项设置为 'submit' 以在提交 event 上进行更新。

Set the updateOn option to 'submit' to update on a submit event.

const control = new FormControl('', { updateOn: 'submit' });

将控件重置为特定值link

Reset the control back to a specific valuelink

你可以通过传递独立值或同时包含值和禁用状态的表单状态对象（这是唯一无法计算的两个属性）来重置为特定的表单状态。

You reset to a specific form state by passing through a standalone value or a form state object that contains both a value and a disabled state (these are the only two properties that cannot be calculated).

const control = new FormControl('Nancy'); console.log(control.value); // 'Nancy' control.reset('Drew'); console.log(control.value); // 'Drew'

将控件重置为其初始值link

Reset the control to its initial valuelink

如果你希望始终将控件重置为其初始值（而不是 null），可以传递 nonNullable 选项：

If you wish to always reset the control to its initial value (instead of null), you can pass the nonNullable option:

const control = new FormControl('Nancy', {nonNullable: true}); console.log(control.value); // 'Nancy' control.reset(); console.log(control.value); // 'Nancy'

将控件重置为初始值并禁用link

Reset the control back to an initial value and disabledlink

const control = new FormControl('Nancy'); console.log(control.value); // 'Nancy' console.log(control.status); // 'VALID' control.reset({ value: 'Drew', disabled: true }); console.log(control.value); // 'Drew' console.log(control.status); // 'DISABLED'
